txt.en: Turtles in the marshlands near Tadrent have grown aggressive in the wake of the Corsair invasion. Their sharpened beaks are known to penetrate even armour of fine make, so efforts to rout the Corsairs by force might be hindered by the marsh turtles. The people of Tadrent would be well-served by a cull of the turtles, whose numbers would certainly recover in time.
You have defeated many marsh turtles near Makham Mijann.
The sharp beaks of the turtles of Belfalas may prove a hindrance to those seeking to rout the Corsair threat in Makham Mijann.

Marsh turtles can be found in the marshlands to the south of Makham Mijann in Belfalas.\n\nYou have encountered angered marsh turtles in the marshlands near Tadrent and should cull their numbers for the good of the people.

While their sharp beaks could have also posed a threat to the nearby Corsairs, you have done the people of Tadrent a great service by culling the turtles in the marshlands. Future efforts to rout the Corsairs will no longer be threatened by the marsh's wildlife.
